name: International Bank of America Corporation
description: International Bank of America Corporation (IBAC) is a global financial institution providing a wide range of banking and financial services to individuals, businesses, and governments. Founded in 1990 and headquartered in New York City, IBAC has established itself as a leader in investment banking, asset management, and private wealth management. The bank operates through various segments, including retail banking, commercial banking, investment banking, and wealth management, serving millions of customers around the world. With a commitment to innovation, IBAC leverages technology to enhance customer experience, offering digital banking solutions that make banking more accessible and efficient. The bank is also focused on sustainability, investing in green initiatives and responsible lending practices to support economic growth while addressing environmental challenges. IBAC's mission is to deliver exceptional financial services and create lasting value for its clients while contributing positively to the communities it serves. With a strong global presence and a diverse portfolio of services, IBAC is well-positioned to navigate the complexities of the financial landscape and help clients achieve their financial goals.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA
